supersolids.santos2

TWO-COMPONENT 3D GP EQUATION WITH CONTACT AND DIPOLAR INTERACTIONS AND LHY

Version of Oct. 7, 2021

NOTES: If I take Nb/Na << 1 I recover the results for a single component

ISSUES: I seem to have some sort of problem with the LHY. The double system collapses. I will make different checks: Check that for Nb=0 I get the same as for one component Check that when I increase I get the same as Viktor does
